Hi there, I'm Arshi, an 11 year old girl. I live in India 🇮🇳. So I have been a kpopper since I was 2 years old. I'm a fujoshi. Also a Slytherin 💚🐍 These are the kpop groups I stan at the moment:

Stray Kids TXT BTS Enhypen Seventeen Monsta X EXO Super M Ikon NCT Way V Big Bang Shinee Blackpink Itzy Aespa Twice Gidle And many more...

My first kpop fandom was shawol shinee. My first bias was Jonghyun. (Rip angel 💕) First bias wrecker was Gdragon.

As I stated earlier, I'm also a fujoshi, which means that I watch bl and yaoi. Give bls a try and I'm sure you'll get hooked. So anygays, I don't have anything else to say...

Byeee beautiful people, have a nice day. Believe in yourself. 💕💕
